src_original: āha: na śakyaṃ kulaputra asaṃskṛtadarśinā niyāmāvakrāntisthitenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayitum /

src_original: evam eva nāsaṃskṛtaniyāmaprāpteṣu buddhadharmā virohanti /  sumerusamāṃ satkāyadṛṣṭim utpādya bodhicittam utpadyate /  tataś ca buddhadharmā virohanti /
